profile.about: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. responsibilities: Developed Know Your Customer (KYC) application which automates verifying the identity of clients and assessing potential risks of illegal intentions for the business relationship; managing application deployment; Designing application architecture;
Developed automotive application for iOS and Android; Developing B2C features; Creating user interface based on provided mockups (Xamarin.Forms);

Developed mobile application for iOS and Windows that serves a navigation aid for both helicopter and aircraft pilots during all kinds of flight operations in C#; worked with clients to provide best solutions and validate requirements; designed application architecture; optimized memory and CPU/GPU performance in order to improve device stability and battery life; adopted and extended Tangram-ES map rendering library in C++; created native bindings to managed code; developed user interface based on provided mockups; performed code reviews to keep systems up to standards;
Developed application in C# that manages and synchronizes user receipts; implemented receipt OCR data recognition; developed user interface based on provided mockups;
Developed Android client for online distribution marketplace in Kotlin/Java; designed and developed user interface based on desktop mockups; created REST client library;
Designed and developed mobile advertise application in Kotlin and Swift to promote another project;

Developed cross-platform MMO strategy game for iOS, Android and Facebook in C#; worked closely with backend team to met requiremenets; designed and implemented REST client; optimized network performance based on prediction and request batching; implemented number of external payment providers like Xsolla, Google Play and App Store;
Developed a PoC of multiplayer third person shooter for PC in C# for a Wargaming; developed network synchronization and replication components;
Written a software to convert games from Torque Engine into Unity 3D in C#; ported serie of time management strategy games from PC to mobile;
Took a part in development of VR application for large area stores; developed a heatmap system to track client eyes in C++;
Created game framework in JavaScript and HTML5 (Canvas); developed over 20 simple educational games based on this framework;

Developed automated trading system (C#); Designing and developing distributed services (Akka.NET); Developing application interface (ASP.NET, Entity Framework, MS SQL); Creating trading algorithms; Integrating third-party services (REST, WebSocket);

Developed first class secure messaging mobile application in Kotlin; designed and created a communication protocol built on top of blockchain technology; implemented end-to-end data encryption; developed hierarchical deterministic Bitcoin wallet;
Third-party maintainer of Yahoo Flurry Analytics plugin for Unity 3D (C#, Objective-C, Java); Maintaining library with is listed on Yahoo official documentation.

profile.clause: I agree to the processing of personal data provided in this document for realising the recruitment process pursuant to the Personal Data Protection Act of 10 May 2018 (Journal of Laws 2018, item 1000) and in agreement with Regulation (EU) 2016/679 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 27 April 2016 on the protection of natural persons with regard to the processing of personal data and on the free movement of such data, and repealing Directive 95/46/EC (General Data Protection Regulation)
